ygData.subject: Re: The second incarnation of the Trueshot bow
ygData.msgSnippet: You may no this and just have a typo, but the phrase is NOT [where the enchanted bows] it IS [where the enchanted bows are] PS i have tried every person at the
ygData.messageBody:
You may no this and just have a typo, but the phrase
is NOT [where the enchanted bows] it IS [where the
enchanted bows are]
PS i have tried every person at the felwithe
enchanter's guild
Gerek
master fletcher

--- "Cooper, Mark" <blackhawk@...> wrote:

<HR>
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0
Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>

<STYLE></STYLE>

<BODY bgColor=#c0c0c0>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>Well here is a update...
I have tried all of
Felewthe with no luck and the High elf in OOT ..I have
been looking many places
for this elf that will respond to the phrase {where
the enchanted
bows}...</FONT></DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>I have had no luck so I
have put forward a prize /
quest for this information... I will give a 100pp or a
TS bow to the person that
gives me the name and location of the high elf that
responds to the statement
above. I'm on bristlebane server only so this prizes
is limited to this server..
but I will share any info I get with you my fellow
master
fletchers..</FONT></DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>Take care </FONT></DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>Karvar
Blackhawk</FONT></DIV></BODY></HTML>
